title: Uchi no Ko no Tame naraba, Ore wa Moshikashitara Maou mo Taoseru kamo Shirenai.
synopsis: Eighteen-year-old Dale Reki is a skilled, kind, and respected traveler, acknowledged as one of the leading adventurers in the city of Kreuz. One day while on the hunt for magical beasts, he comes across a sweet devil girl named Latina. She is alone, dressed in rags, and bears the devils' symbol of a criminal: a broken horn. Concerned for her wellbeing, Dale decides to ensure Latina's safety by bringing her to his home, eventually leading to him adopting her.
related_anime: ['Latina no Nikki', 'Uchi no Ko no Tame naraba, Ore wa Moshikashitara Maou mo Taoseru kamo Shirenai.']
voices: ['Takao, Kanon', 'Okamoto, Nobuhiko', 'Numakura, Manami', 'Koyama, Tsuyoshi', 'Fukuo, Yui', 'Nishimura, Tomomichi', 'Tamura, Mutsumi', 'Nakahara, Mai', 'Otagiri, Yui', 'Shibahara, Chiyako']
